title: Eresos
description: An ancient settlement on the island of Lesbos (modern Skala Eresou), reputed birthplace of the poet Sappho. Strabo describes it as being built on a hill (presumably the modern Vigla) and extending down to the sea.

properties.description: Point determined with reference to Google Earth imagery and digital elevation model.
properties.title: Imagery Location of peak of Vigla hill
